title: Leveraging Credentials As Unique Identifiers: A Pragmatic Approach To NHI Inventories
description: Identity-based attacks are on the rise. Attacks in which malicious actors assume the identity of an entity to easily gain access to resources and sensitive data have been increasing in number and frequency over the last few years.
